vista.gui
Class DialogButtonPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  vista.gui.DialogButtonPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DialogButtonPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Takes care of creating a panel with OK, Cancel, and Apply buttons. These buttons then call back the applyChanges and doneChanges functions in the Changeable interface.

See Also:
Changeable, Serialized Form
